item.description:
The first meeting will be about introductions, getting together, discussing the group and planning what kinds of things we (as a group) would like to do together. Anyone who enjoys coffee is welcome to come!

I apologize but I had to make some last minute changes to the location of our meeting tonight because Barnes & Noble could not accommodate the size of our group. I hope this is not going to be a huge inconvenience for you. I sincerely apologize.
The meeting has been moved to the Common Grounds, 1096 Main Street in Branford.
There will be a table reserved for us and a delicious assortment of coffees and desserts will be available.

Hope to see you there.
item.name: Coffee Talk August Meetup - Location Change
